forum.name: Reflection on Learner Experiences
forum.intro:
Reflect on a learning experience that was difficult for you in which you ultimately succeeded. The experience doesnâ€™t need to be academic in nature. For example, consider learning a new technology, learning to cook/bake, or fixing an appliance. Think about what led you to be successful despite the challenge.

Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. As you reflect, answer the guiding questions:

  • What actions did you take?
  • What experience did you draw on?
  • What motivated you?
  • What did you learn about yourself through this experience?
  • What impact did the learning environment have on your success?
